alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 8:25AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Charles, southwestern Orleans and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 900 AM CDT... At 824 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Destrehan, or near Hahnville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Avondale, Metairie, Hahnville, Marrero, Harvey, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Jefferson, Gretna, Harahan, Westwego, Jean Lafitte, Luling, River Ridge, Boutte, Ama, Destrehan, Estelle and St. Rose. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 218 and 242. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Western Orleans
